issue.title: Support set filter operators on Hive partitioned Parquet files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2761](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2761). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Pyarrow supports many operators on hive partitioned parquet files. It should add in support for set operations similar to https://github.com/dask/fastparquet/blob/master/fastparquet/api.py#L335

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2761?focusedCommentId=16528645) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2188
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2188>
